title: After Dark – Student Short Film (Lead & Supporting)
description: Student narrative short film casting lead and supporting roles. The project is a horror thriller set in public wooded parks after closing. A park ranger uncovers a threat when people begin vanishing after dark. Production focuses on tension, atmosphere, and suspense. Local talent only (Oklahoma City/Norman area). Pay: $25–$50 per filming day by role. Copy, credit, and meals provided. Callbacks if needed in March 2026. Apply via the link below.
filmingDates: Filming TBD. Oklahoma City/Norman area. Callbacks March 2026 if needed.
submissionDetails: Local talent only. Submit your application through the casting link below.

roles.description: Park ranger; steady and watchful. Lead.
Visitor in the park; starts assured, becomes unsettled. Supporting. Needs strong physical and emotional range.
Little dialogue; performance through physicality and presence. Supporting.
